rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with natural light and greenery. Features Vastu-compliant placement to ensure positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Guest Lobby
rooms.description: Small area for guests before entering the main living space.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious open area designed with eco-friendly materials and ample natural light. Vastu principles suggest this room be in the southern part of the plot for a balanced energy flow.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: Compact yet functional kitchen integrated with indoor dining area. Utilizes energy-efficient appliances and sustainable materials.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Primary bedroom designed for tranquility, aligned with Vastu principles by placing it in the northeast to ensure health and prosperity.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: Small living area dedicated to household staff, ensuring privacy and convenience. Located near service access points while maintaining respectful distance from main living areas.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Dedicated space for utilities, storage, and eco-friendly waste management systems.

openings.description: Large double doors with energy-efficient glass to allow ample natural light while maintaining security.
Open space connecting to the living room and kitchen, allowing fresh air circulation and greenery integration.
Direct entry from the plot boundary leading into a two-car garage designed with sustainable materials.
